11213.content:
Mike took a moment to assess the situation.

He was in a brand new environment, as the son of fairly well-to-do parents, he was living in his own single bedroom apartment just off campus from the college he would be attending in the fall.

Since he moved in he was dreaming about bringing women to the apartment to party with, but with that naturally came the concern of his age. His parents had chosen a fancy apartment building with security guards and cameras in the hall. As a 17 year old he was old enough to attend college, but not legally of the age of consent, and since it was his parent's name on the lease, he knew getting consenting women to spend "quality time" with him was something he could do. But his parents would know if he brought women home because of their connections with the building security.

Now, standing in front of him was a woman. A woman who had not gone past security, who had not been seen on any of the cameras in the hall, a woman who was unseen by the other building residents, a woman who called him "Master" and was offering to serve him. Naturally, to Mike this was a golden opportunity.

"Alright, what should I call you?" Mike asked.

"You always called me 'The Wii,' or the 'Nintendo Wii,' Master. Do you with to call me something else?" Her sing song voice seemed constant.

"You are not a console anymore, you are . . . my servant. Servants have names. You need a name." Mike thought, she was made from a Nintendo console. What did he know about Nintendo? "From now on your name is Kyoto."

She smiled. "Thank you master! I love that name!" She responded very enthusiastically.

"Now Kyoto, why don't you make me a grilled cheese sandwich and get me a soda while I think for a bit." Kyoto strode confidently to the kitchen area and began assembling the makings of the simple meal.

Mike sat down with the manual again. The manual spelled out that any woman created with the Womanizer gun would be completely loyal to the person who had created her. He could ask Kyoto to do anything and she would do it.

He glanced over to her in the kitchen as she buttered some bread for his sandwich. She was facing away from him but occasionally glanced back at him with an enamored look on her face. He jumpsuit was skin tight. He could make out everyone of her curves and the form of her body.

"Kyoto." Mike said.

She turned towards him, buttered bread in hand. "Yes, Master?" She crooned.

"Why don't you sway your hips while you work and move in a sexually suggestive manner?"

She blushed and her grin widened. "Yes, MASTER!" Her deliberate behavior suddenly changed as she started to seductively make grilled cheese. She faced Mike while she buttered bread and slowly swayed her hips back and forth. As she moved food and ingredients around she moved her body back and forth, alternating between thrusting her butt and breasts out to accentuate her curves.

Mike was naturally getting excited in more ways than one. Suddenly it dawned on him. He could make more women with the womanizer. He considered the room around him and rushed to the junk drawer.

11231.content:
Checking his room, Mike looked at the other gaming consoles he has. The one game he liked in particular was his X Box 360. He always enjoyed his 360 ever since he got it and has a great collection of video games. With online play and an attatched Kinect, he’s always on top of everything. Looking at the device in his hand, he smiled and wondered if he can turn his favorite console into a woman. Or better yet, the girl of his dreams.

Since he’s a gamer, he spends less time into socializing with other people, let alone girls. Heck, some girls might find his talent in gaming really weird. Sometimes, they always shew him off and tell him to get lost. It was really hard for him. Especially since the prom is a week away. Even the hotter chicks are getting the jocks while the others are looking for average guys. And being that mostly everybody has dates to the prom, it would be impossible to find someone. But if he can turn his 360 into a woman his age, he might be able to go to the prom after all.

Looking down at the device, there were many options that would help him create the perfect girl from his 360. He then started to jut down his options as quickly as possible. Once he had everything in place he pointed it to his X Box and took a deep breath. “Well, he goes nothing…” he said as he pulled the trigger. A beam of light appeared out of the device and hit the X Box, incasing it in a bright light. Mike watched on in amazement and as the changes started to begin. It was hard to see due to the light glowing so bright that you couldn’t see it, but he can tell that the changes are beginning to take place. His X Box was beginning to glow and take shape as numbs grew from the bottom to the top. The middle started to look curvy as he would see two mounds growing on the top part. He could even see details that mark a human from fingers to toes to face features like a nose, mouth, ears, hair. Once the changes were done, the light disappeared and the transformation was complete. When he looked on, he couldn’t believe what he was seeing.

Standing before him was a hot and sexy woman he never dreamed of. She was the same age as him with a height of 5’2. She had perky BB cups with a slim hourglass figure and long tone arms and legs that make her athletic. Her face was an angel’s with shiny turquois green eyes, a pitite nose, and glossy green lips. Her hair was long and straight as it go down to her lower back and had a color of dark green. The thing that made her unique is the clothes she was wearing. The clothes actually looked like that of the console itself. She was wearing a grayish white dress that goes down to the middle of her thighs. One her stomach is the power button where the belly button is located. One her shoulder sleeves there were two types of objects on them. The one on the left sleeve represented the arrow controls of the controller. The one on the right is the button pad that had all buttons in matching letters and colors. At the top of her chest is the disk ejector to insert the disk. And at the back end of a power cord like tail is underneath the dress and it was moving by itself. She was wearing long gloves that have different types. One that has a white keypad for texting. The other is black with a motions control scanner in the middle, meaning it’s a Kinect glove. On her feet were two pairs of boots of the same size and gray white color.

Mike watched on in total amazement as he saw his X Box 360 looking like a teenage beauty. The young woman looked around and saw Mike looking completely shocked. She then looked at herself and didn’t know what to say. But then she looked up to him and said in a clear voice, “Master? What’s going on? What happened to me?” Mike blinked a couple of times and couldn’t believe what he was hearing. “Wait… Did you just talk?” he said in complete surprise, “And did you call me master?” The woman nodded and answered his question, “Yes, I did speak and I did call you my master. The moment you bought me, I am eternally indepted to you. But you still haven’t answered my question yet. What happened to me and why am I even speaking in English.” Mike knew that this woman is fully aware of what is happening because she was once an inanimate object, let along a gaming console. So he had to tell her what happened or else things could get much worse. So taking a deep breath, he told her everything that happened.

“Where do I begin. Just today I got a device that can turn every inanimate object into a woman. Being that I am a great gamer I decided to test it out on one of the consoles I’ve got. I choose you because you are my favorite console imaginable. Another reason I tested this out is to see if I can get a girlfriend for the prom. I mean since I don’t have a girl the dance, I thought that this would be a good enough option. At first I thought that this is one big joke someone’s been pulling on me. But when I tried it on you, I never knew this was going to work, let alone it being real. I’m sorry if I did this just to see how it works and got you caught in it. If you are uncomfortable about this, I can change you back. That’s an option here that can return you back to normal. What do you say? Shall I change you back?”

The woman looked at him and was confused at what he said. From what she can understand is that Mike turned her into a woman by using a device that turns every inanimate object into a woman. And he turned her into one because he wanted to test it out to see if it’s real. It comes into a complete surprise as she never thought he would do that for her. So now she had to make a decision. Would she stay the way she is or go back to a lifeless console?

121.content:
Ashley closed the door behind her. Shutting out the outside world could be quite a relief for her after a long day of cheer practice. Her room was a small neatly kept shrine to her life. There family photos and cheerleading awards adorned the walls. Some of the happiest and saddest memories were on those walls. As a High School Senior, she was nearing the end of her career as a High School Cheerleader, and she couldn't wait.

Ashley flopped down on her bed and breathed a sigh. She was safe. She didn't need to hide anything or worry about anyone learning her secret in here. She was safe.

Ashley had been hiding the fact that she is a lesbian for many years. Her family was more than a little religious and not particularly tolerant of the LGBT community. Ashley had originally joined the cheer-squad following her freshman crush, Simone. During that year, Ashely grew to like cheerleading so much that she stuck with it despite Simone having moved away.

Simone wasn't her last crush, though. Her time cheer-leading, Christian summer camp, and even just her day to day life had presented her with a few girls, some pretty, some shy, some smart, some geeky, and some quirkily charming who she would have loved to have a chance at romance with. But she kept those feelings bottled up inside. College was her best hope. She imagined joining the rainbow coalition, a hundred miles away from her family and pastor where she didn't have to worry about being judged or disowned for trying at romance with some pretty girl.

Ashley rolled over to take a quick nap before deciding what to do with her Friday night. That's when she noticed something under her pillow. A box.

She pulled the box out and opened it. Inside was what looked like a toy ray-gun. What did she do with it?
121.title: Ashley

12111.content:
Ashley landed face down in her bed, startled but unharmed.

She looked up to see that the mirror was now engulfed in a golden light. The light hugged the mirror's surface. Ashley could not see it's stained oak frame or the glass, only a glowing rectangle as bright as a fluorescent bulb.

The light changed shape. Slowly at first and them more quickly it lost it's right angles and took on a more human shape. It was hard to make out the details because of how bright it was.

Suddenly, there was a flash that looked like lightning. Ashley's vision was dazzled and she had to blink repeatedly. When her vision cleared again, she was no longer alone in the room. Standing where her mirror was a woman.

The woman looked about six feet tall (about the same height as Ashley's mirror). Her dress was a v-neck, sleeveless, front wrap that reflected everything in the room. Ashley could not believe what she was seeing, the fabric was like a formfitting fun house mirror.

(An idea what the dress looked like: http://tinyurl.com/zu2cchx)

The features of the woman herself were just as striking. She was slender with square shoulders and supple terracotta skin. Her eyes were like round pools of mercury.

(What mercury looks like, http://tinyurl.com/z4f3yhy)

The mysterious woman stepped towards Ashley who was still startled and lying on her bed.

"Mistress Ashley, how may I serve you?"

Ashley was more than a little confused by this whole situation.

"Who are you? Where did you come from? What are you doing here?" Ashley asked.

The strange woman smiled. "I am your mirror, mistress."

Ashley's eyes crossed for a second. What? How was that even possible. Her toy gun had the ability to create life, specifically life in the form of gorgeous women who would do whatever she wanted. Ashely picked up the gun and scrambled to the bed. She looked through the box for a set of instructions. She found a single piece of cardstock:

"This is the womanizer. A device capable of creating women from inanimate objects. Women created will physically resemble the object that was used to create them. The person who used the gun will have full command of the woman's loyalty. Have fun and use responsibly!"

Looking over at her first creation, she decided to.

info.brief_description: An odd machine turns inanimate objects into beautiful women!
info.description:
Welcome to the womanizer interactive! You're character finds an object that turns inanimate objects into women! There are a couple rules.

1. The woman must slightly resemble what she originally was. For example, if she was a brick wall, she'll be muscular and her clothes will look like bricks.
2. The women will be loyal to however changes them.
3. Keep it pg 13.
4. Unless it is simply giving you more choices, make the chapters at least 3 sentences.

Other than that, have fun!
